details.description:
Practicalities

Refreshments and lunch will be provided. Free Wi-Fi available. Please arrive by 9.15am on the first day to help us start at 9.30am.

Venue Room

The training room at the Open Data Institute.
details.alternative_title: Course: Open Data for Marketers, 22 January 2014, Open Data Institute
details.location: The Open Data Institute, 65 Clifton Street, London, EC2A 4JE
